Interesting articles from May

May 31, 2018

A selection of articles I found interesting this May. I get them mostly from Hacker News so I also link the HN thread in the discussion link.

Why we should bulldoze the business school

A critic to business schools written by someone that has been working and teaching in one of them for 20 years (discussion).

You are probably not getting enough sleep, and it is killing you 

One more interesting article about the caveats of not getting enough sleep (discussion).

After 5 years and $3M, here’s everything we’ve learned from building Ghost

Ghost, the story of a bootstrapped business based on open-source with yearly revenue of $1.2 million (discussion).

Reality driven development

Waterfall, Kanban, Scrum and reality (discussion).
